title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 86.4 - Exhibit 3: alternatives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 86.4 - Exhibit 3: alternatives

State Regulations
(a) The
applicant shall submit a statement explaining what consideration, if any, was
given to: (1)
any alternative route; (2)
the expansion of any existing
right-of-way of the applicant or of another; (3)
any alternate method which would fulfill
the energy requirements with comparable costs. Such statement shall include the
comparative advantages and disadvantages of any alternative
considered. (b) The
applicant shall, on New York State Department of Transportation maps, indicate
any alternative route considered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
86.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
